record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 2 P.M., MONDAY, MAY 14, 2007

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, it is my understanding there is no further business to come before the Senate today. That being the case, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 12:08 p.m., adjourned until Monday, May 14, 2007, at 2 p.m.
